project.title: User Panel - MVP
project.description: Simple user management panel for basic CRUD operations on users and roles with authentication and role-based access control

phases.title: Setup and Authentication
phases.description: Week 1: Project foundation setup including database design, Express.js server configuration, Next.js frontend initialization, and core authentication system with JWT tokens and bcrypt password hashing.

phases.title: User Management Implementation
phases.description: Week 2: Complete user management backend APIs for CRUD operations, user profile management, user status control (active/inactive), and password reset functionality.

phases.title: Role System Development
phases.description: Week 3: Implement role-based access control system including custom role creation, user-role assignment functionality, permission checking middleware, and access control enforcement.

phases.title: Testing & Deployment
phases.description: Week 4: Complete frontend development with Tailwind CSS, integrate all components, implement testing, and prepare for deployment. Build simple dashboard and finalize MVP features.
